QuestData.Title: The Missing Muskpaw
QuestData.Description: What the heck are you supposed to be? |5$C? Never heard of one of them. You here to help or to steal my yaks?$b$bLook, if yer' insistin' on helpin' out, go find my boy. He got himself grabbed by a bunch of sprites and probably doesn't even know we lost the ranch.$b$bThey dragged him off to Pranksters' Hollow south east of here. Go rescue him an' I'll see about giving you a reward of some sort.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Muskpaw Jr. in Pranksters' Hollow.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Muskpaw Jr. at Pranksters' Hollow in Kun-Lai Summit.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for the save, stranger!
